channel.title: Computer Vision on Kulin Shah
channel.description: Recent content in Computer Vision on Kulin Shah

item.title: Relative Attributes
item.description: Python Implementation of Visual Relative Attributes for Image Classification and Zero Shot Learning Description This implementation refers to paper Relative Attributes, D. Parikh and K. Grauman, International Conference on Computer Vision (ICCV), 2011. Original code given by authors was in matlab. This repo contains python code for learning relative ranking function using Newton optimization implemented from scratch. Also Zero Shot Learning with Gaussian Mixture Model is implemented in python.
